# interactive-select
## Installation
```
pip install interactive-select
```
## How to use
```
usage: interactive-select [-h] [-m MIN] [-M MAX] [-d] [-j] [-i] [items ...]

positional arguments:
  items

options:
  -h, --help         show this help message and exit
  -m MIN, --min MIN
  -M MAX, --max MAX
  -d, --debug
  -j, --json
  -i, --index
```
